QuestData.Title: Cease Fire!
QuestData.Description:
The enemy has turned our forward cannons around on us.
Scuttle that equipment to stop the bombardments!
QuestData.CompletionText: Scuttle means destroy, landlubber! Now go do it!
QuestData.RewardText: The thunder of cannons can strike fear or inspire hope, depending on which end you're standing.
